description.p: A video player with a focus on 3D and Virtual Reality. Bino can play stereoscopic 3D and 360째/180째 videos, and display them on 3D displays and in Virtual Reality environments including SteamVR and CAVEs.
Improvements to the user interface and improved support for OpenGL quad-buffered stereo mode.
Improved meta data detection, for automatic selection of stereoscopic 3D and surround modes.
Added support for HDR video input with tone mapping, and for zooming in surround videos.
Added support for slideshow mode and improved compatibility with ARM platforms. Fixed various bugs.
Added support for capturing screens and windows and for HDMI frame packing output. Fixed various bugs.
Added support for 180째 video, playlists, and more output formats. Fixed color conversion bugs.
Rewritten based on Qt, with new support for 360째 video and more powerful Virtual Reality support including autodetection of SteamVR.
